item.title: CVE-2024-24707|2024-04-03T12:20:42.983Z -- Cwicly Builder, SL. -- Cwicly
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Cwicly Builder, SL. Cwicly allows Code Injection.This issue affects Cwicly: from n/a through 1.4.0.2.
